greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle [1,1,1,0,0,0,...] DELTA [1,0,0,0,...] with Deléham DELTA defined in A084938.
comment: Equal to A062110*A007318 when A062110 is regarded as a triangle read by rows.
formula: T(n,k) = 3*T(n-1,k) + T(n-1,k-1) - T(n-2,k) - T(n-2,k-1), for n > 1. - _Philippe Deléham_, Feb 12 2012
The Riordan square of the odd indexed Fibonacci numbers A001519. - _Peter Luschny_, Jan 26 2020
maple: # The function RiordanSquare is defined in A321620:
RiordanSquare(1 / (1 - x / (1 - x / (1 - x))), 10); # _Peter Luschny_, Jan 26 2020
mathematica: nmax=9; Flatten[CoefficientList[Series[CoefficientList[Series[(1 - 2*x)/(1 - (3 + y)*x + (1 + y)*x^2), {x, 0, nmax}], x], {y, 0, nmax}], y]] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 11 2017 *)
xref: Row sums are A006012. Diagonal sums are A147704.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Nov 10 2008
